text: Ani mothya mhatarya striya, jyanna apalya vivahaci asa (ani iccha) ca rahili nasavi, tya jara apale kapade (padadyasathi vaparalele) utaravuna thevatila tara tyancyavara kahi dosa nahi (matra ya ativara) ki tya apali sobha- sajavata dakhavinarya nasavyata. Tathapi tyancyasathi heca adhika cangale ahe ki tyanni yapasuna alipta rahave. Ani allaha sarva kahi aikanara va jananara ahe
